snippet: “Edgewise” is an oral history commemorating the life of the influential critic, actress and art-world luminary, who collaborated with the likes of John Waters and Nan Goldin.
abstract: “Edgewise” is an oral history commemorating the life of the influential critic, actress and art-world luminary, who collaborated with the likes of John Waters and Nan Goldin.

headline.main: A New Book Celebrates the Downtown Icon Cookie Mueller
